description: Opis    Cpl Jobs is a part of the larger European recruitment and HR services    group,  Cpl Resources. companyDescription: CPL Poland    Cpl Jobs is a global provider of recruitment,  staffing and outsourcing    services,  with 36 offices worldwide incl.  Ireland,  United Kingdom,     Spain,  Holland,  Poland,  Czech Republic,  Slovakia,  Hungary,  Tunisia and    more.  Our job is to find the best candidates for our clients and to    find the best jobs for our candidates.     We recruit across a wide variety of industries and functions including:    • ICT    • Construction    • Science    • Customer Support    • Engineering    • Finance    • Retail    • Banking    • HR    • Sales    • Administration    • Marketing    We're strong believers in "work" and "ability",  and how they combine    for success.  We call it "workability" and it describes what we look for    in candidates.  When our recruiters meet candidates in person,  we look    for the intangible characteristics that make you more than just a list    of skills and experience.  When we speak to our clients we don’t just    put forward a CV,  we put forward a person with true “workability”.
